amendment.description: To add a provision relating to certain requirements in the acquisition of welded shipboard anchor and mooring chain.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3813 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 38. Record Vote Number: 60.

action.text: Amendment SA 3813 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Murray to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2408-2409; text: CR S2408) To add a provision relating to certain requirements in the acquisition of welded shipboard anchor and mooring chain.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3813 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Murray to Amendment SA 3801.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3813 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 38. Record Vote Number: 60.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3813 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 38. Record Vote Number: 60.
